trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around October 14th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsWas waiting for the Oct 14th ufo sighting. At work in salem, Or Fairview Training Center, Center of Complex has a big open expanse to easily view the stars and saw in the SE sky, near the orion cluster, an unusual star, that was standard planet size. But was twinkling in spectrum colors. Also seemed to move slightly back and forth. don't know if it was a satelite, or maybe the space station, but it just seemed to want to be watched. Never lost sight of it. Though the twinkling was mesmerizing.
Summary: Over sized and rainbow colored star
